attributes.action: Make the number of people who recovered from COVID-19 available to see.
attributes.additional_details: Reporting that additional daily cases are fewer compared to previous days is quite vague, and knowing how many people actually recovered from the virus gives a clear picture of whether the situation is actually improving in the UK. Therefore, it is a right to know the rate of those who recovered and it would increase hope and positivity for the UK .
attributes.background: As COVID-19 cases keep increasing, reaching some occasional plateau, the number of people who actually recovered from the virus is not available on platforms such as worldmeter and the government site.
